full_sentence: The amount of hamstering in that article is mind boggling. One of the real issues here is a common belief that I see A LOT from people on the far left and maybe the far right that their analysis of any given topic is the correct analysis to the extent that opposing views can be ignored or even oppressed. The author should have made their gender status known from the beginning if they believe other people‚Äôs perspectives matter. Why bother hiding it, anyway? ur partner is going to find out in the end.

full_sentence: The fact that she's slating her A&E treatment, during this pandemic, is INFURIATING. Newsflash you selfish whore cunt, A&E is for ACCIDENTS AND EMERGENCY. You know, life threatening emergencies. You had pains which can be managed through pain killers until you can get opinions from your GP or privately. Stop wasting the NHS already pressured resources for your precious endo pain you utter hoe bitch cunt.
